CustomField.description: Formula to display a visual icon to the user displaying if we're inside or outside SLA
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Inside SLA') && (ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Holding email sent') || ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'N/A')) , IMAGE("/resource/EmailReplyGreen", "Inside SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Approaching violation') && (ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Holding email sent') || ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'N/A')) , IMAGE("/resource/EmailReplyAmber", "Approaching SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Outside SLA') && (ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Holding email sent') || ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'N/A')) , IMAGE("/resource/EmailReplyRed", "Outstanding", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Inside SLA') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in approval') , IMAGE("/resource/EmailApprovalGreen", "Inside SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Approaching violation') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in approval'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailApprovalAmber", "Approaching SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Outside SLA') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in approval'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailApprovalRed", "Outstanding", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Inside SLA') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in Draft') , IMAGE("/resource/EmailDraftGreen", "Inside SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Approaching violation') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in Draft'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailDraftAmber", "Approaching SLA", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Outside SLA') && ISPICKVAL(EmailStatus__c, 'Email in Draft'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailDraftRed", "Outstanding", 25, 25), IF( ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Paused') && ISPICKVAL ( Status, 'Await response'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailPause", "Paused", 25, 25), IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(SlaStatus__c, 'Paused')) && ISPICKVAL ( Status, 'Await response'), IMAGE("/resource/EmailAwaitReply", "Awaiting response", 25, 25), "")))))))))))
CustomField.label: SLA Icon
